oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ESTIMATION OF PROBABILITY AND COST-FUNCTIONS FOR ANTIBODY-PRODUCTION SYSTEMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JOSHI, RR
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: receptors
kinetics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The concept of 'cost' linked with biochemical energy utilization in biological functioning is considered for the immune system. A method for the estimation of parameters, cost functions and probability distributions for an associated optimization problem is presented. Applied results for real experimental systems are given.
